ZARA seven times in two years on the quality Heibang, however, often face the challenge but silence ZARA to right. But "quality gate" is not just ZARA's patent, according to industry sources, the fast fashion brand "incorrigible", including H & M, GAP, C & A will always be in the "Heibang" to see their shadows. Roger Vivier Shoes The end of April, AQSIQ announced H & M baby jacket hem fiber composition and content of site failure; last June, the Shanghai Quality and Technical Supervision has announced that, H & M in a pH value of failure knit leisure jacket .

A few years ago, a factory to complete a 4 styles, 40000 clothing orders take up to 20 weeks. Now, the factory will be the efficiency of clothes every day 500 in the first five weeks to complete 20000; clothing such as a strong response after the listing, Makati to catch up the rest of 20000. Roger Vivier Pumps Topshop compress the production cycle to 6 weeks, while, H & M, refused to disclose their products from design to market only takes 3 weeks. Shorten the production cycle to ensure product quality itself is a test, and rapid expansion also leads to a fast fashion brand repeated quality problems.

Asked respondents about the media in the fast fashion brand to buy if there are problems of quality, 61.91% of consumers indicated the existence of the problem and make their intolerable; 28.57% of consumers indicate a problem, but the problem less severe, can be tolerated; only 9.52% of consumers said no quality problems, quality problems are really not difficult to see fast fashion brand has become a short-term production derived from a major drawback.

Professor Qiu Zhongping, Roger Vivier Black Belle Vivier Ballerinas Flats Pumps Sichuan University, said the cost is double-edged sword, good control of cost accounting will bring many benefits for the enterprise, but also allow companies to reduce costs maliciously hurt consumers.
